titles.title: Monetary Policy Reform Act of 1993
A bill to provide for a Federal Open Market Advisory Committee, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S735-737)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Monetary Policy Reform Act of 1993 - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to establish the Federal Open Market Advisory Committee to advise the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System on the conduct of open-market operations.
